summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/01/16 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jon Cassar', 'Brad Turner', 'Milan Cheylov', 'Bryan Spicer', 'Stephen Hopkins', 'Ian Toynton', 'Frederick King Keller', 'James Whitmore Jr.', 'Tim Iacofano', 'Kevin Hooks'], 'Starring': ['Kiefer Sutherland', 'Leslie Hope', 'Sarah Clarke'], 'Studio': ['FOX']} Review Text: Drags by doing every show in a one hour period. After a while you are like let's get moving, I follow what is going on.

I just finished the first season and the second season jumps way past where the last one ended. Very strange how it starts because you don't know how anyone got where they are now. Review Title: Started off good Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/01/16 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Alrick Riley', 'Bharat Nalluri', 'Sam Miller', 'Omar Madha', 'Julian Holmes', 'Edward Hall', 'Justin Chadwick', 'Julian Simpson', 'Bill Anderson', 'Jonny Campbell'], 'Starring': ['Rupert Penry-Jones', 'Peter Firth', 'Raza Jaffrey']} Review Text: If you like UK shows, it is good. It does have its politically correct moments. Keeps you guessing, sorry to see it end. Review Title: Really enjoyed Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Monumental: In Search of America's National Treasure Review Date: 2013/01/16 Store: Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Documentary Product Description: ['Monumental is the story of America’s beginnings. Presented, produced, and starring Kirk Cameron, the 90-minute true story follows this father of six across Europe and the U.S. as he seeks to discover America’s true “national treasure” – the people, places, and principles that made America the freest, most prosperous and generous nation the world has ever known.\xa0 Monumental is heralded as “inspiring,” “beautifully executed,” “powerful,” and “one meant to teach.”Long regarded as “the land of opportunity,” there’s no question the tiny band of religious outcasts who founded this country hit upon a formula for success that went way beyond what they could have imagined. How else can you explain the fact that they established a nation that has become the best example of civil, economic and religious liberty the world has ever known?\xa0What formula did they discover? What motivated them to come here in the first place? More importantly, how can we apply these same foundational truths today?\xa0Take your family on a new adventure to discover the true national treasure of America.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Documentary-music', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': "Monumental: In Search of America's National Treasure", 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.25 x 0.5 inches; 2.24 Ounces', 'Item model number': '884006', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 25 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 3, 2012', 'Actors': "Monumental: In Search of America's National Treasure", 'Studio': 'Word Films P&D', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Kirk goes on a journey to see whether the history is correct or has it been rewritten to change history. Review Title: Wow...got to watch... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/05/13 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Steven DePaul', 'Bill Norton', 'James Whitmore Jr.', 'Vahan Moosekian', "Terrence O'Hara", 'Steve Gomer', 'David Mamet', 'Michael Zinberg', 'Helen Shaver', 'Gwyneth Horder-Payton'], 'Starring': ['Dennis Haysbert', 'Regina Taylor', 'Audrey Marie Anderson'], 'Studio': ['CBS']} Review Text: Enjoy the program. Plots and action good. Seems to be going down the path of a soap opera with a bunch on side affairs going on. Needs to stay more the action parts and less on the AFFAIR parts. Review Title: Good program Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for dramatic and engaging storytelling, as evidenced by high ratings for series and documentaries that are rich in action and plot complexity. Consistent themes across their purchases suggest an inclination towards content that features intense narratives with elements of suspense and historical exploration. 

Quality is paramount; the individual consistently rates products above 4.5, indicating a strong dissatisfaction with narratives that meander or lack coherence. Sentiments reveal a desire for content that provides clarity and progression, showing frustration with convoluted plot structures. 

The reviews reflect a preference for content that not only entertains but also provokes thought, as seen in their appreciation for documentaries that seek to uncover historical truths. Price sensitivity appears low, suggesting a willingness to invest in higher-quality productions regardless of cost, focusing instead on content value.

Overall, the core preferences indicate a passion for high-caliber, engaging narratives, particularly those that combine action and meaningful content, while exhibiting a critical eye towards pacing and plot development.

target_interaction.title: Not worth watching!
target_interaction.text: If you are going to make a movie based on a story line, it should ring ture. This one fell flat on its face!
